All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Camp
Represents a Camp object A Camp contains the CampInfo attribute which contains the information of the camp @see CampInfo with each information being an Aspect of the camp @see CampAspect A camp object also contains userIds of attendees and camp committee, as well as the ids of enquiries and suggestions tied to this camp object Each camp object has a unique campId which is an auto-incremented static attribute
CampAspect
Represents the CampAspect ENUM
CampControlInterface
Represents the CampControlInterface to be implemented by CampController
CampController
Represents the CampController class Holds a list of Camp objects Holds all methods to interface with the Camp object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
CampInfo
Represents the CampInfo record class Automatically checks if the CampInfo object is complete CampInfo object is complete if it contains all the CampAspect ENUM values CampInfo object is incomplete if it does not contain all the CampAspect ENUM values
Cams
The Java App class that contains main
CamsInteraction
Static class to hold static menu choices and static user menus used in the CAMS app.
Controller
Represents a Controller ENUM class which is a singleton Holds all the controllers for the program via the interface Inherits from User class
ControllerItemMissingException
Represents a custom exception for when an item is missing from the controller
ControllerParamsException
Represents a custom exception for when a parameter is of the wrong type
Directory
Represents a controller class that controls the relationships between entities.
doApproveSuggestion
Interaction that represents the action of approving a suggestion.
doChangePassword
Represents the action of changing the password
doDeleteAttendeeRegistration
Interaction that represents the action of removing a user from a camp.
doDeleteCamp
Interaction that represents the action of deleting a camp from the database Effectively serves as a function pointer
doDeleteEnquiry
Interaction that represents the action of deleting an enquiry Effectively serves as a function pointer
doDeleteSuggestion
Interaction that represents the action of deleting a suggestion.
doEditCampDetails
Interaction that represents the action of changing the value of a single camp detail for a camp Effectively serves as a function pointer
doEditEnquiry
Interaction that represents the action of changing the contents of a submitted enquiry Effectively serves as a function pointer
doEditSuggestion
Interaction that represents the action of changing the contents of a submitted suggestion Effectively serves as a function pointer
doGenerateAttendanceList
Interaction that represents the action of generating and printing a camp report.
doGeneratePerformanceReport
Interaction that represents the action of generating and printing the performance report of camp committee members to csv report.
doNothing
Interaction that represents the no action.
doRejectSuggestion
The interaction representing the act of rejecting a suggestion.
doSubmitAttendeeRegistration
Interaction that represents the action of adding a user to a camp as an attendee.
doSubmitCamp
Interaction that represents the creating and saving a camp into the database.
doSubmitCommitteeRegistration
Interaction that represents the action of adding a user to a camp as a camp committee member.
doSubmitEnquiry
Interaction that represents the action of creating and saving an enquiry regarding some camp, to the database.
doSubmitReply
Interaction that represents the action creating and saving a reply to some enquiry to the database.
doSubmitSuggestion
Interaction that represents the action of creating and saving a suggestion for some camp to the database.
doToggleVisibility
Interaction that represents the action of changing the visibility of a camp to a value other than its original value.
Enquiry
Represents an Enquiry Object A Enquiry has the base attributres of a campId, enquiryBody seen (whether the enquiry has been seen, if seen, cannot be edited), creationDate and lastUpdatedDate Each enquiry has a unique enquiryId which is an auto-incremented static attribute
EnquiryControlInterface
Represents the EnquiryControlInterface to be implemented by EnquiryController
EnquiryController
Represents the EnquiryController class Holds a list of Enquiry objects Holds all methods to interface with the Enquiry object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
Faculty
Represents the Faculty ENUM Used to represent the which user group a camp is for
GetData
Class that contains a method for parsing the datatypes we use as string.
Interaction
 
Location
Represents the Location ENUM Used to represent the set of all possible locations for a camp
Login
Class that deals with logging in
Lookup
A class that implements the functions required for a directory.
MenuChoice
Represents a choice that can be offered in a Menu along with other choices.
MissingRequestedDataException
Exception thrown when some Interaction does not have the requisite data it requires to carry out its action.
ParseInput
Contains the functions relating to string manipulation of user inputs that are exclusively used by camsAction.
Perms
Represents the Perms ENUM Used to represent the permissions of a user to determine what they can do in the system and what they can view
queryCampsMenu
Interaction that represents the action of giving the user a list of camps to choose from, not filtered by any camp aspect.
queryEnquiriesMenu
Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of enquiries on their list to choose from.
queryFilterCampByMenu
Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of aspects to filter camps by Effectively serves as a function pointer
querySuggestionsMenu
Interaction that represents the action of offering users a list of on their list suggestions to choose from.
ReadWriteCampCSV
The Class that contains function to read and write the "camp_list" CSV file.
ReadWriteEnquiryCSV
The Class that contains function to read and write the "enquiry_list" CSV file.
ReadWriteSuggestionCSV
The Class that contains function to read and write the "suggestion_list" CSV file.
ReadWriteUserCSV
The Class that contains function to read and write the "staff_list" and "student_list" CSV files.
Role
Represents the Role ENUM Used to represent the role of a user in a camp
Staff
Represents a Staff object Inherits from User class
StaticMenu
Represents user menus where the dependencies and behaviours are defined at compile time.
Student
Represents a Student object Inherits from User class
Suggestion
Represents a Suggestion Object A Suggestion has the base attributres of a campId, rationale, suggestionAspect (the CampAspect to alter @see CampAspect), accepted (whether the suggestion has been accepted by the camp committee), creationDate and lastUpdatedDate Each suggestions has a unique suggestionId which is an auto-incremented static attribute
SuggestionControlInterface
Represents the SuggestionControlInterface to be implemented by SuggestionController
SuggestionController
Represents the SuggestionController class Holds a list of Suggestion objects Holds all methods to interface with the Suggestion object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
User
Represents a User object Inherited by Student and Staff classes A User has the base attributres of a userId, password, faculty and permissions
UserControlInterface
Represents the UserControlInterface to be implemented by UserController
UserController
Represents the UserController class Holds a list of User objects Holds all methods to interface with the User object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
UserInfoMissingException
Custom exception for when a user's information is missing
UserMenu
An interaction that when run, displays a menu to the user.
